function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exponential growth of COVID-19 cases due to uninhibited spread","Impact":"Increased transmission and higher number of cases","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective anti-contagion policies and behavior changes","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, ventilation systems, sanitation measures","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"High susceptibility of population to the virus","Impact":"Risk of uninhibited exponential growth of infections","Mitigation":"Vaccination campaigns, public health education, behavior changes","Technologies":"Vaccines, remote monitoring systems, public health communication tools","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public health authorities, community leaders, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of policies in reducing growth rate of infections","Impact":"Continued exponential growth of cases despite policy implementation","Mitigation":"Evaluation and adjustment of existing policies, development of new interventions","Technologies":"Data analytics, modeling software, real-time monitoring systems","People":"Public health experts, policymakers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Research institutions, government, public health authorities"}]}
